#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int num;
    cin>>num;
    char a[1001];
    cin>>a;

    for(int i=0;a[i]!='\0';i++)
    {
        if(a[i]=='L')
            num=ceil(num/2.0);
        else if(a[i]=='W')
            num=(num*2)+11;
    }
    cout<<num<<"\n";




    return 0;
}
